EXTRACTED VALUE: If you've got kids of a gaming age then they'll enjoy playing this and, thanks to the excellent two-player mode, you'll still get to join in.
With Xbox Live play, leagues and mini-games you're never going to be bored - unless you just don't like American football. [Nov 2006, p.100]
By movie-to-game standards, King Kong is an instant classic. Just don't hold it to any greater standard.
This street racing franchise still has lots of life, and Most Wanted is provides some invigorating racing for all levels of gamers.
For diehard folks who loved the first console version, this Xbox 360 version is an interesting conundrum. It's better, but not by much.
